author: Simon Difford
description: Take a citrusy hopped beer and add a tad more citrus in the shape of Rosolio di Bergamotto. The result is predictably citrusy, refreshing and suited to the aperitivo moment rather than a night down the Rose & Crown.
name: IPAlicus
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir
